abstract: Results in first round of local elections in France confirm country's overall shift toward right wing.
lead_paragraph: Though the first round did not remake French politics overnight, it confirms that voters are seeking change as the National Front continues to gain ground.

headline.main: In France, Local Elections Maintain Rightward Trend
headline.print_headline: In France, Elections Maintain Shift to Right

snippet: Though the first round did not remake French politics overnight, it confirms that voters are seeking change as the National Front continues to gain ground.
